version_description:
NEW IN RELEASE 2.0:

-View your holdings in mutual funds, stocks and other securities deposited on Service Account, Custody account and Investment Savings Account
-Sign agreement for Internet and phone services (requires that you are a Nordea customer)
-Sign up for payment service
-General improvements and bug fixes

This release include a bug fix and improvements
• Bug fix: QR-reader can read QR-codes with amount 0
• Performance improvements related to Market data information

NEW IN RELEASE 2.2:

-Send e-mails to Nordea
-Top up your mobile cash card

New in version 2.2.1
The name have been changed on two accounts:
-Placering changes to Fastränteplacering
-Deposit Valuta changes to Deposit

- New look and colours
- Choose your own personal code
- Currency converter
Minor bugfixes

-OCR reader
-Adjustment of colors and improved contrast
Mindre buggfixar

-Chatta med oss
-Se väntetider för chatt, telefon och e-post

- Se värdet på ditt pensionssparande och din avtalspension hos oss direkt i appen.
- Gå direkt till Nordea Investor utan att behöva logga in igen.
Små förbättningar
Some minor improvements
Enhanced support for VoiceOver and additional minor improvements
Text corrections
New look and feel. Higher contrast for improved readability. Chat is accessible right from the main page.
Now you can start using Apple Pay (Requires iOS 11 or later).
Now you can start using Apple Pay (Requires iOS 11 or later).
Some minor improvements
Some minor improvements
Some minor improvements
Some minor improvements
You can now get started with your savings by simply opening the menu and tapping «Save with Nora»!
Some minor improvements
Minor improvements
Some minor improvements
Some minor improvements
Some minor improvements
We have updated the mobile bank, so you can get a better overview of your economy, and included new features.
Minor improvements

We are constantly trying to improve Nordea Mobile to be as good as possible for our customers. In this 3.1 update:

Make it your home:
Make the home screen yours. Choose the information you need, by adding and removing the widgets you want.

Choose your language:
Want your iPhone in English, but your banking in Swedish? Check out the language settings in the More menu.

Follow your spending:
Get real-time insight into your card spending. The new Wallet widget tracks your monthly credit and debit totals.

Hope you like it!
Some minor improvements
Improvements in the invoice scanner
Some minor improvements

Nordea Mobile. Always close at hand.

We are continuously improving our mobile bank based on your feedback. The latest version contains the following new features and improvements:
- Notification for failed internet purchases with card is back!
- Sign documents directly in the app – no need to log on to Netbank.
- Buy new funds and manage your monthly savings easily.
- Have a look at the new Product and Services section
- Customise your front page even further with the new shortcut widget
- Check the status of your loans quickly with the new loan widget
- Add or remove trusted devices to further enhance security.
- Minimise chat and online meeting windows.
- Looking for answers? Now you can search and filter your previous chats with us.

Want to know more about the mobile bank or need help getting started? Read more at nordea.se/mobilbanken (only in Swedish)

Nordea Mobile. Always close at hand.
We are continuously improving our mobile bank based on your feedback. The latest version contains the following new features and improvements:
- Notification for failed internet purchases with card
- View your monthly savings
- Signing documents
- New Product and Services section
- Customise your front page with the new shortcut and loan widgets
- Add or remove trusted devices to further enhance security.
- Minimise chat and online meeting windows and now you can search and filter your previous chats with us.

Want to know more about the mobile bank or need help getting started? Read more at nordea.se/mobilbanken (only in Swedish)

Nordea Mobile. Always close at hand.
We are continuously improving our mobile bank based on your feedback. The latest version contains the following new features and improvements:
- Notification for failed internet purchases with card
- View your monthly savings
- Signing documents
- New Product and Services section
- Customise your front page with the new shortcut and loan widgets
- Add or remove trusted devices to further enhance security.
- Minimise chat and online meeting windows and now you can search and filter your previous chats with us.
- Minor improvements

Want to know more about the mobile bank or need help getting started? Read more at nordea.se/mobilbanken (only in Swedish)

Nordea Mobile. Always close at hand.
We are continuously improving our mobile bank based on your feedback. The latest version contains the following new features and improvements:
- Notification for failed internet purchases with card
- View your monthly savings
- Signing documents
- New Product and Services section
- Customise your front page with the new shortcut and loan widgets
- Add or remove trusted devices to further enhance security.
- Minimise chat and online meeting windows and now you can search and filter your previous chats with us.
- Minor improvements
- Bug fixes
Want to know more about the mobile bank or need help getting started? Read more at nordea.se/mobilbanken (only in Swedish)

•Do you sometimes need to share information about your transactions? Great news! Now you can share information about a transaction directly in Nordea Mobile.
•Do you have a hard time remembering the pin codes to your card? Don’t worry! Now you can securely view the pin codes for all your cards directly in Nordea Mobile.

We have some exciting new features for you.
- Do you prefer dark mode? Now you can enjoy Nordea Mobile in a dark colour scheme.
- If you want to use Nordea Mobile in landscape mode, it’s now possible. Just turn the phone and the orientation changes.
- And finally, the online meetings feature has been improved.

All the best from Nordea’s mobile team

- Bug fixes
- Do you prefer dark mode? Now you can enjoy Nordea Mobile in a dark colour scheme.
- If you want to use Nordea Mobile in landscape mode, it’s now possible. Just turn the phone and the orientation changes.
- And finally, the online meetings feature has been improved.

All the best from Nordea’s mobile team

New features and improvements this Winter:
- Support for the split-screen feature on iPads.
- More flexibility for you to manage your allocation plan. You can add/ remove funds. Even change the allocation weights of each fund in the plan.
- Trading/fund execution now possible when using UK version of the app
- Improvements in the Investment and Wallet widget

Happy New Year

We have received a lot of good feedback. And because of that we have made some changes to the app.

- Payments can now be found in the top of the Home screen. 
- A new service tab has been added - see a glimpse of the services we can offer you. A guide after login will show you the changes. 
- Get personal rewards from connected brands directly from the Services menu. 
- You can now change your Swish related settings in app.
To help you in these difficult times, we have made it possible for you to apply for changes on your mortgage payments, with a simple link.

We have added some new features and improvements to your mobile bank. Hope you’ll like them!

• You can now give nicknames to your cards. 
• Account payments is now made easier with bank selection instead of full bank list. 
• We introduce to you Cashback! When shopping in selected stores and restaurants with your card, you will get part of the amount reimbursed.

We have received a lot of good feedback. Because of that we have made some changes to the app:

- You can add other banks in the app. See information in the Overview tab
- New detail page under funds with more information about the fund selected and graphic overview of key information.
- We have simplified some instructions to guide you even better.
- The automatic log out time from inactivity will be changed from 15 minutes to 5 minutes.

Hope you like it!

We have received a lot of good feedback. Because of that we have made some changes to the app:

- Bug Fixes
- You can add other banks in the app. See information in the Overview tab
- New detail page under funds with more information about the fund selected and graphic overview of key information.
- We have simplified some instructions to guide you even better.
- The automatic log out time from inactivity will be changed from 15 minutes to 5 minutes.

Hope you like it!

We have received a lot of good feedback. Because of that we have made some changes to the app:

- Bug Fixes
- You can add other banks in the app. See information in the Overview tab
- New detail page under funds with more information about the fund selected and graphic overview of key information.
- We have simplified some instructions to guide you even better.
- The automatic log out time from inactivity will be changed from 15 minutes to 5 minutes.

Hope you like it!

Summertime is here and we have made a small package of new features for you

- From SEK to USD, Euro to RAN or any other listed foreign currency. You can now use the currency calculator in the app to get the rate.
- Help us getting your contact information right! You can now add your personal contact information under “More” in the app.
- Bug fixes

Summer Greetings
The Nordea Mobile Team
- Bug fixes

After a nice summer we’re back in business. We have used the summer to add some new features for you.
• Need to apply for a raise in your mortgage loan? Start the procedure conveniently from the new link in the loan section.
• A longer transaction history is back – you can now view your account transactions 18 months back.
Enjoy the newest update.
- Bug fixes

Fall is here! The trees are changing colour and some app improvements are on their way! Hope you’ll like them! 

-You can now find more information on upcoming and previous loan notifications under each loan.
-Now you can add CSN and see your student loans in the Overview.
-It is now possible to start and edit monthly savings to funds.


Greetings from The Nordea Mobile Team
We have made some minor updates to ease your experience. Please note that you need iOS 11 or higher to use the next version of the app, which is expected to be released in November.

There are specks of light in the fall darkness – for example new updates of the app! You can now:

-add and remove e-invoice recipients
-see more detailed information on your loans and savings in other banks.

You need iOS 11 or higher to be able to use the 3.16 version.
We hope you will enjoy the update!

We would be pleased if you would tell us what you think through the feedback function in the app. The feedback is anonymous and therefore we will not be able to reply. Please contact Customer Service for personal banking matters.

Regards from the Nordea Mobile Team

New update alert!

- transfer money quickly between your Nordea accounts by pressing and holding down on an account
- edit your Swish settings by pressing the Swish icon on the start page
- use the new search tool under Savings & Investments to search for equities and funds to buy
- make abroad payments
- our virtual advisor and our chat have new designs
- the Payment Scanner for paying bills has been improved

We kindly ask for your feedback via the feedback function. It is anonymous and we will therefore not be able to reply. Please always contact Customer Service for personal banking matters.

Thank you!
Nordea Mobile Team

New update alert!

- transfer money quickly between your Nordea accounts by pressing and holding down on an account
- edit your Swish settings by pressing the Swish icon on the start page
- use the new search tool under Savings & Investments to search for equities and funds to buy
- make abroad payments
- our virtual advisor and our chat have new designs
- the Payment Scanner for paying bills has been improved

We kindly ask for your feedback via the feedback function. It is anonymous and we will therefore not be able to reply. Please always contact Customer Service for personal banking matters.

Thank you!
Nordea Mobile Team

We have a new update ready for you!

• apply to increase your Private loan, amortize extra or move your other loans to Nordea through the button Manage your Privatlån under your loan
• we have changed the name of the More-tab to Profile
• the currency calculator has been moved to the Shortcuts widget on the home screen
• we have made some improvements to the chat
• when you place a fund order you will get a message if your balance on the connected cash account is lower than the order amount.

We kindly ask for your feedback via the feedback function. It is anonymous and we will therefore not be able to reply.

Nordea Mobile Team

New update!   

• Apply to increase your Private loan, amortize extra or move your other loans to Nordea through the button Manage your loan under your loan 
• See upcoming loan payments on your loans for the next 30 years under each loan and Upcoming payments. 

We kindly ask for your feedback via the feedback function. It is anonymous and we will not be able to reply. Thank you!    

Nordea Mobile Team

New update!

• Do you need to dispute a card transaction? You can now do it by pressing on the card and then Security
• get help when we are closed! In the Contact tab you can get answers to common questions around the clock
• get currency advice when making a cross boarder payment
• add highest or lowest accepted price limit when selling or buying securities in the app.

We kindly ask for your feedback via the feedback function.

Thank you!
Nordea Mobile Team
